    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Bralne vaje - koncentracija</string>
            <string language="en">Reading exercises - concentration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseübungen - Konzentration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exercices de lecture - concentration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exercícios da leitura - concentração</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esercitazioni della lettura - concentrazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ασκήσεις ανάγνωσης - συγκέντρωση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ejercicios de la lectura - concentración</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Vaje za učence, ki imajo težave s koncentriranim branjem, to je s tem, da usmerijo svojo pozornost na besedilo in obdržijo določeno stopnjo pozornosti tudi med branjem. Vaja usmerja pozornost na neko besedilo.</string>
            <string language="en">Collection of short exercises for developing reading perception, keeping the concentration.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">branje</string>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">koncentracija</string>
            <string language="en">concentration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pozornost</string>
            <string language="en">attention</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kratka beseda</string>
            <string language="en">short word</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ansammlung kurze Übungen für sich entwickelnde 
Lesevorstellung, die Konzentration halten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Collection d'exercices courts pour la perception 
se développante de lecture, gardant la concentration.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coleção dos exercícios curtos para a 
percepção tornando-se da leitura, mantendo a concentração.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Accumulazione delle esercitazioni corte per la 
percezione di sviluppo della lettura, mantenenti la concentrazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συλλογή των σύντομων ασκήσεων για την ανάπτυξη της 
αντίληψης ανάγνωσης, που κρατά τη συγκέντρωση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Colección de ejercicios cortos para la opinión 
de la lectura que se convierte, guardando la concentración.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messwert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konzentration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufmerksamkeit</string>
